cause.description:
There are numerous market reform packages and other proposals that can extend health care to more people, make it cheaper, and make the care people receive a lot better. It would be very nice to give free Health Care to everyone, but it isn't realistic if we want the economy to survive and don't want people paying close to half of their income to taxes. So, let's focus on extending coverage to the 15% of people who do not have any form of health care and let's also fix the numerous problems within our current health care system.
1. Socialized Medicine will destroy the economy.
2. It is impossible to come up with the money needed for 300 million people to get free healh care service without taking money away from other important things and taxing the hell out of everyone.

cause.name: Fix Health Care Without Socializing It
